parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender of user enum (0 = female, 1 = male, 2 = other)

post.description: Add "like" entry to event, returns updated like count - number of unique users liked that particular data_id (as event_like_count)

parameters.name: data_id
parameters.description: Data ID of event to attach to

400.description: Wrong input data (f.e. parameter data_id is missing)

post.description: Gets binary request content and saves as file. Allowed mime types for upload (image/jpeg, image/gif, image/png, image/svg+xml, image/bmp, image/tiff)

parameters.name: data_id
parameters.description: Data ID of event to attach to

400.description: Wrong input data (f.e. parameter data_id is missing)

get.description: Pass GPS location and get position information

General API request for events.

Examples

"10 Záznamů podle vzdálenosti od GPS polohy"

/events?limit=10&offset=0&order=distance&base_lat=50.0912137&base_lng=14.4815498

Vypsat 10 záznamů (limit = 10), od prvního (offet = 0), seřazené podle vzdálenosti (order = distance) od Café Bar Lampičky (base_lat = 50.0912137, base_lng = 14.4815498)

"Nezobrazovat záznamy typu tag 142"

/events?limit=10&offset=0¬tags-0[field]=tagset¬tags-0[comparison]=notany¬tags-0[value]=142

"Záznamy Pro ženy a pohodu" (seznam tagů - 253, 202, 174, 138, 135, 163, 256, 129, 223, 198, 247, 227, 173, 266, 248, 251 etc.)

/events?limit=10&offset=0&tags-0[field]=tagset&tags-0[comparison]=any&tags-0[value]=253&tags-1[field]=tagset&tags-1[comparison]=any&tags-1[value]=202&tags-2[field]=tagset&tags-2[comparison]=any&tags-2[value]=174&tags-3[field]=tagset&tags-3[comparison]=any&tags-3[value]=138&tags-4[field]=tagset&tags-4[comparison]=any&tags-4[value]=163&tags-5[field]=tagset&tags-5[comparison]=any&tags-5[value]=256&tags-6[field]=tagset&tags-6[comparison]=any&tags-6[value]=135&tags-7[field]=tagset&tags-7[comparison]=any&tags-7[value]=129&tags-8[field]=tagset&tags-8[comparison]=any&tags-8[value]=198&tags-9[field]=tagset&tags-9[comparison]=any&tags-9[value]=223&tags-10[field]=tagset&tags-10[comparison]=any&tags-10[value]=231&tags-11[field]=tagset&tags-11[comparison]=any&tags-11[value]=244&tags-12[field]=tagset&tags-12[comparison]=any&tags-12[value]=247&tags-13[field]=tagset&tags-13[comparison]=any&tags-13[value]=248&tags-14[field]=tagset&tags-14[comparison]=any&tags-14[value]=245&tags-15[field]=tagset&tags-15[comparison]=any&tags-15[value]=227&tags-16[field]=tagset&tags-16[comparison]=any&tags-16[value]=246&tags-17[field]=tagset&tags-17[comparison]=any&tags-17[value]=173&tags-18[field]=tagset&tags-18[comparison]=any&tags-18[value]=177&tags-19[field]=tagset&tags-19[comparison]=any&tags-19[value]=257&tags-20[field]=tagset&tags-20[comparison]=any&tags-20[value]=250&tags-21[field]=tagset&tags-21[comparison]=any&tags-21[value]=225&tags-22[field]=tagset&tags-22[comparison]=any&tags-22[value]=221&tags-23[field]=tagset&tags-23[comparison]=any&tags-23[value]=251&tags-24[field]=tagset&tags-24[comparison]=any&tags-24[value]=229&tags-25[field]=tagset&tags-25[comparison]=any&tags-25[value]=230&tags-26[field]=tagset&tags-26[comparison]=any&tags-26[value]=266

All fields of response object can be used to build query.
List of the most common parameters is listed below.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of items to be returned

parameters.name: base_lat
parameters.description: Current GPS latitude of the user

parameters.name: base_lng
parameters.description: Current GPS longitude of the user
